paper_abstract: The problem of adaptive synchronization is considered for stochastic delayed neural networks with Markovian switching and Levy noise. The aim of the problem is to derive a sufficient condition and an adaptive control strategy such that the synchronization can be achieved for the master system and the slave system. By generalized Ito's formula and Lyapunov functional method, a sufficient condition in terms of LMI is established to ensure the synchronization of the two systems, and the adaptive update law is determined as well. A numerical simulation is provided to verify the usefulness of the proposed criterion. (C) 2015 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Adaptive synchronization of delayed Markovian switching neural networks with Levy noise
